From: Sabrina Cate <cate8888@...>

hi i am interested in getting my kids out of public school and start
the
unschooling but i don't know where to start please help me . thank you

start here:

Take them out. Tomorrow. What do you have to lose?

then here:

http://www.SandraDodd.com/unschooling

Everything you always wanted to know about unschooling but were afraid
to ask! <g>

Also this book: Parenting a Free Child, An Unschooled Life by Rue Kream


~Kelly

messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] how to get started- AZ
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Sabrina, Welcome.  Where in Arizona are you?  I m in Tucson & also have a 7 yr old, as well as a 10 yr old. Arizona is a great place to unschool!  You can
messages.messageBody:
Hi Sabrina,



Welcome. Where in Arizona are you? I'm in Tucson & also have a 7 yr old,
as well as a 10 yr old.



Arizona is a great place to unschool! You can go to tucsonhomeschooling.org
and check out "Arizona regulations" on the left hand side.

The law says you need to file an Affidavit of Intent to homeschool and send
it to your county's school superintendent. You might want to take it in
person because you also need to show the child's birth certificate.

And that's it!



You might also want to check out the Home Education Network of Arizona at
www.hena.us <http://www.hena.us/>



heather









we are in arizona my kids are 7yrs almost 5 and 2 i only have the oldest in
school but the other one is set for next year please help thank you so much
sabrina



_____
